TreatMent.name: Continue anti-inflammatory and muscle relaxant medications p.r.n.
Start or continue physical therapy 2/3/4 times a week for _____
MRI _____ shoulder, _____ elbow, _____ wrist, _____ knee to rule out ligament tear and/or synovial injury. (If symptoms persist/mandatory) other _____.

Discussed _____ right/left shoulder/knee arthroscopy versus conservative management with the patient. The patient states that due to continued pain and lack of relief with physical therapy and inability to perform day-to-day activities due to pain, the patient would like to move forward with surgery/consider surgery but first would like to discuss all options with family members and lawyer. The _____ arthroscopic surgery is tentatively scheduled for _____. The patient will move forward with _____ arthroscopy after appropriate rehabilitation has been done on the _____.
